name: Colorful (xinoHITO)
description:
Colorful is a parkour hack-n-slash where you must restore color to the world. Glide, wall run, and grind your way through a dreamlike landscape while battling the dark enemies that have consumed the color of the world! Experience Jonah’s personal story while discovering the secrets behind the darkness!

  • Experience a unique blend of parkour movement with hack-n-slash gameplay!
  • A unique movement system for total freedom and fluidity!
  • Recolor the world! The more you paint the world the stronger your color powers become!
  • Traverse a dreamlike landscape with colorful environments!
